snippet: Jury selection is to start in the federal trial of John Edwards, the former Democratic senator from North Carolina, who is being tried on six felony charges.
abstract: Jury selection begins in the federal trial of John Edwards, who is charged with six felony charges, including four that he accepted illegal campaign contributions; prosecutors contend that Edwards used nearly $1 million to hide his affair with Rielle Hunter and the daughter the couple conceived.
lead_paragraph: Jury selection is to start in the federal trial of John Edwards, the former Democratic senator from North Carolina, who is being tried on six felony charges.
